extension.name: MailChimp Signup Module
extension.author: 3by400, Inc.
extension.description: Allows the user to sign up for a MailChimp mailing list without screen refresh, thanks to the magic of AJAX.

field.name: show_errors
field.label: Show Detailed Errors
field.description: If yes, will display detailed error messages from the MailChimp server on the front page

field.name: mc_api_key
field.label: MailChimp API Key
field.description: Log in to your MailChimp control panel, then go to 'account' -> 'API Keys & Authorized Apps'

field.name: mc_unique_id
field.label: MailChimp List Unique ID
field.description: From your MailChimp control panel, select the list you want people to subscribe to, then click on the 'settings' tab, and at the bottom of the screen you'll see the unique id for that list. Enter that value here

field.name: showlist
field.label: Show List Name
field.description: Show the name of your MailChimp list in the signup module.

field.name: textsize
field.label: Length of Input Field
field.description: The maximum number of characters you want to be displayed in the name, email, etc text input fields. This comes in handy on narrow columns. It won't go less than 10 characters. If left blank the default is 25 characters.

field.name: askname
field.label: Ask Extra Fields
field.description: Ask for the users first and last names. Pro version only: also ask for any additional fields you have defined in the signup module.

field.name: askinterest
field.label: Pro Feature: Ask For Interest Groups
field.description: Ask the user for the interest groups you set up for this MailChimp list.

field.name: mc_secure
field.label: Use secure connection
field.description: Connect to MailChimp using a secure (SSL) connection.

field.name: mc_checkemailaddress
field.label: Check Email Address Validity
field.description: Check signup emails against a pattern. Disable if you see a validly formatted email address that fails to go through.

field.name: lang_override_success
field.label: Custom Success Message
field.description: Display this on a successful signup

field.name: lang_override_failure
field.label: Custom Failure Message
field.description: Display this on a signup error

field.name: before_module
field.label: Pro Feature: Content Before Module
field.description: Add content to appear above the signup form.

field.name: after_module
field.label: Pro Feature: Content After Module
field.description: Add content to appear below the signup form.

field.name: mc_ajax_type
field.label: AJAX Type
field.description: Determines the AJAX method that is used to contact MailChimp. Change this setting only if you have a conflict with another extension.
field.option: Self - Calls this page again to make the AJAX call.
Direct - Calls the AJAX helper directly.

field.name: mc_timeout
field.label: Timeout
field.description: Timeout in seconds (10-500) to wait for the API call.

field.name: mc_placeholder
field.label: Email input placeholder
field.description: Text which show in email input placeholder

field.name: mc_verify_ssl
field.label: Verify SSL
field.description: Only turn this setting off if your webserver does not provide a valid certificate bundle.
